title: The nonfreeness quantifier for classes
content: In this section, we prove the symmetry of the nonfreeness quantifier for classes.

blocks.name: bj-nfcsym
blocks.content: The nonfreeness quantifier for classes defines a symmetric binary relation on var metavariables (irreflexivity is proved by ~ nfnid with additional axioms; see also ~ nfcv ). This could be proved from ~ aecom and ~ nfcvb but the latter requires a domain with at least two objects (hence uses extra axioms). (Contributed by BJ, 30-Sep-2018.) Proof modification is discouraged to avoid use of ~ eqcomd instead of ~ equcomd ; removing dependency on ~ ax-ext is possible: prove weak versions (i.e. replace classes with setvars) of ~ drnfc1 , ~ eleq2d (using ~ elequ2 ), ~ nfcvf , ~ dvelimc , ~ dvelimdc , ~ nfcvf2 . (Proof modification is discouraged.)
